name: Higurashi Kakera
description:
Visual Novel Game with RPG sections.  Homage to Deen Animation of Higurashi as it retells stories as well as new ones, with different endings and choices.  You play various characters in attempt to stop a girl Rika from dying.  But a strange paranoia that cause even the mundane to look dangerous and monsters to appear helps complicate the task.  Besides various chapters, there is a free-play failed world area to gain xp, gear and unlock characters.  As you complete chapters, new chapters unlock and treasures appear in other chapters to help replay of different endings.  Each character has their own playstyle and types of gear. 

Current Version:  Higurashi Kakerav2021h

For Latest Game Updates: http://higurashirpg.blogspot.com/

Operating System Microsoft® Windows® 2000 / XP / Vista (64bit not supported) / Windows 7+Processor Intel® Pentium® III 1.0GHz or higher processor.(Pentium® 4 2.0GHz or higher processor recommended) Memory 256 MB or higher of RAM (512 MB or higher recommended) Display 1024×768 or higher resolution

Feel free to contact me if find bugs, spelling errors, running it on twitch or need help.
